Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 2.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 1.0+

```
init(_ value: CGFloat)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-7ag2w#see-also)

### [Converting Floating-Point Values](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-7ag2w#Converting-Floating-Point-Values)

[`init<Source>(Source)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-1488d)Creates a new instance from the given value, rounded to the closest possible representation.[`init(Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-o1k9)Creates a new instance initialized to the given value.[`init(Float)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-5h7qh)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(Float16)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-aeox)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(Float80)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-9z7ob)Creates a new instance that approximates the given value.[`init(sign: FloatingPointSign, exponent: Int, significand: Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(sign:exponent:significand:))Creates a new value from the given sign, exponent, and significand.[`init(signOf: Double, magnitudeOf: Double)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(signof:magnitudeof:))Creates a new floating-point value using the sign of one value and the magnitude of another.[`init<Source>(Source)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(_:)-1oh9r)Creates a new value, rounded to the closest possible representation.[`init(truncating: NSNumber)`](/documentation/swift/double/init(truncating:))
